Instruction: Combine the sugar, cornstarch, and 3 cups of milk in a large saucepan. If making chocolate, add cocoa powder. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and comes to a boil.
Combine the remaining cup of milk with the egg yolks, whisk until homogenous. As the pudding thickens, incorporate the egg yolk mixture, stirring continuously. Allow the mixture to boil for 1 minute.
Take the pan off the heat, then mix in the butter and vanilla.
Pour the mixture into baked pie shells or containers for chilling.
